# Kaggle Competitions

## 2020 M5 Forecasting - Accuracy
(https://www.kaggle.com/c/m5-forecasting-accuracy)[2020 M5 Forecasting - Accuracy]

### 数据描述
+ calendar.csv(14) - Contains information about the dates on which the products are sold.
+ sales_train_validation.csv(1919) - Contains the historical daily unit sales data per product and store [d_1 - d_1913]
+ sell_prices.csv(4) - Contains information about the price of the products sold per store and date.
+ sales_train_evaluation.csv - Available once month before competition deadline. Will include sales [d_1 - d_1941]
+ sample_submission.csv(29) - The correct format for submissions. Reference the Evaluation tab for more info.

### 目标函数
The accuracy competition will use the metric: Weighted Root Mean Squared Scaled Error (RMSSE)
